profile.name: Paragraph 1
profile.content: PASSION FOR DEVELOPMENT. I'm a passionate developer always striving for clean form, user-friendly interfaces and robust functionality. My background may seem unconventional, but it has given me unique insights and equipped me with valuable skills.

profile.name: Paragraph 2
profile.content: BROAD EXPERIENCE AND GLOBAL PERSPECTIVE. With a degree in International Studies and over 15 years of experience working in education, I have gained invaluable experiences in student and classroom management, curriculum development, and fostering creativity in learning environments. My experiences continue to hone my communication, teamwork and cultural awareness skills. I'm a native English speaker from Canada, and I also speak fluent Japanese, intermediate Spanish and basic Italian. I now live in Spain, but I also spent many years in the Philippines and in Japan, where I completed my schooling.

profile.name: Paragraph 3
profile.content: TECHNICAL SKILLS AND GROWTH MINDSET. My recent graduation from Ironhack's Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp has bolstered my determination to leverage my problem-solving skills and collaborative spirit in the world of technology. Beyond technical skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and React.js, I possess a strong work ethic, adaptability, resourcefulness, and a commitment to continuous learning.

projects.name: This Portfolio
projects.description: Built using React for a dynamic frontend and a Node.js API for lightweight data persistence. I utilize vanilla CSS here to further my understanding of foundational elements and how they come together. This portfolio is constantly evolving, with upcoming features like a MongoDB server and user authentication for admin CRUD operations and enhanced backend functionality.

projects.imageAlt: Screenshot of EXO App: Cosmic Logger project
projects.name: EXO App: Cosmic Logger
projects.description: Developed as a collaborative project at Ironhack's full-stack web development bootcamp, this app showcases CRUD functionality and implementation of React-Bootstrap. Although it is currently paired to a custom-built Node.js API for lightweight data storage, upcoming plans include MongoDB server integration with user authentication and commenting functionality. Other plans include reworking its futuristic raypunk/dieselpunk dystopian design.

projects.imageAlt: Screenshot of Billy Biscuit game project
projects.name: Billy Biscuit: Cookie Collector
projects.description: Catch falling cookies and dodge enemy sprites in this arcade-style browser game! Featuring collision detection and all graphics made by me using MS Paint and Paint 3D, this game began development as a solo first-module project at Ironhack's full-stack web development bootcamp. This game showcases my continuously deepening understanding of core programming concepts and DOM manipulation, and it is constantly being worked on and updated as my skills improve.

projects.name: Project L.U.I.S.
projects.description: The final project in Ironhack's full-stack web development bootcamp, this collaborative app was built using the MERN stack and features full CRUD operations, user authentication and Mongoose's population functionality.
